title: all gameloft games 240x320 for java based mobiles like samsung a
description:
Games For Samsung And Lg Mobiles Java Based 240x320 Screen Size
===================================================================================
1) download (get) a .jar file and a .JAD file
2) Put the TWO files on your mobile
-- make sure they are in the map "other files"
3) go to the normall screen (this is the one with the wallpaper on it =P)
4) go to other files where is your files
5) press a .JAD file you want
6) install
7) wait.. for a few seconds..
8) go to the java game folder and PLAY! =D

love from SK enjoy
